desc: The details matter. We know this, being collectors too. So we give all our attention to designing and hand-crafting each strap. All to make every detail, from thickness to stitching, feel just right for your watch.

layout.text:
Handmade & Hand Finished.
The details matter. We know this, being collectors too. So we give all our attention to designing and hand-crafting each strap. All to make every detail, from thickness to stitching, feel just right for your watch.
